name: shotalot
description:
Shoot moving targets for score before timer runs out. Single player or local co-op.

Points

  • small fish = 300
  • shark = 100
  • angler = 90
  • seahorse = 50

High scores for single player and co-op(combined player scores) saved.

Controls

Single player:

  • Aim left/right = left/right arrow
  • Fire = down arrow

Local co-op(2nd player) - screen upper left toggle button:

  • Aim left/right = A/D
  • Fire = S

Press 'Escape' key to pause or quit.

You can substitute your own art content for the games default art content by unzipping the 'local_art.zip' file to Unity's persistentDataPath which should be something similar to:

C:\Users\User1\AppData\LocalLow\Saluda Systems\shotalot

and substituting your own png files named the same as what is listed in the zip file. Then within the game, in the 'pause' menu, toggle the 'Use Local Art:On' and 'Restart'. The game should show the new local art content.

When creating your own png images to use with Gimp,use Layer->Transparency->'Add Alpha Channel' if not present to create a transparency layer and use Layer->Transparency->Color to Schema to make solid background colors like white paper transparent. You can also manually cut or brush away the parts of the image you wish to be transparent. Recommend keeping the image size the same as the default image also.
